text:
@realDonaldTrump How much less is 15M than 325M?   

325M - 15M = 310M   

310,000,000 US citizens haven't been tested.  

And with you suggesting masks aren't macho, subtract 1,000,000 minimum from both totals.  They'll be COVID-19 victims.
